TopicTitle: Sector 7 Space Laboratories Flight Decks Sneak Peak

Articles.Content:
A sneak peak of our latest project at Sector 7 Space Laboratories (Project: Flight Decks) This project as brought many hindsight ideas and lessons, the game plan here is to build a space station that will provide docking for hover crafts, space planes along with fuel, labs and communications....etc. I've decided to start the station build with this Flight Deck Complex. The last test results were a shortage of fuel to achieve orbit around Kerbin, we are currently updating the launcher with more nuclear powered engines and additional fuel. More pictures will be posted periodically of this on going project I hope that you enjoy the pictures and ideas that we may be providing to the KSP community. Please note this structure is not very clean looking it will be upgraded in the future for better looks and functions.

Many complications but we are learning!
